004
005package edu.wpi.first.math.kinematics;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Rotation2d;
008
009/** Represents the state of one swerve module. */
010@SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
011public class SwerveModuleState implements Comparable<SwerveModuleState> {
012  /** Speed of the wheel of the module. */
013  public double speedMetersPerSecond;
014
015  /** Angle of the module. */
016  public Rotation2d angle = Rotation2d.fromDegrees(0);
017
018  /** Constructs a SwerveModuleState with zeros for speed and angle. */
019  public SwerveModuleState() {}
020
021  /**
022   * Constructs a SwerveModuleState.
023   *
024   * @param speedMetersPerSecond The speed of the wheel of the module.
025   * @param angle The angle of the module.
026   */
027  public SwerveModuleState(double speedMetersPerSecond, Rotation2d angle) {
028    this.speedMetersPerSecond = speedMetersPerSecond;
029    this.angle = angle;
030  }
031
032  /**
033   * Compares two swerve module states. One swerve module is "greater" than the other if its speed
034   * is higher than the other.
035   *
036   * @param o The other swerve module.
037   * @return 1 if this is greater, 0 if both are equal, -1 if other is greater.
038   */
039  @Override
040  @SuppressWarnings("ParameterName")
041  public int compareTo(SwerveModuleState o) {
042    return Double.compare(this.speedMetersPerSecond, o.speedMetersPerSecond);
043  }
044
045  @Override
046  public String toString() {
047    return String.format(
048        "SwerveModuleState(Speed: %.2f m/s, Angle: %s)", speedMetersPerSecond, angle);
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * Minimize the change in heading the desired swerve module state would require by potentially
053   * reversing the direction the wheel spins. If this is used with the PIDController class's
054   * continuous input functionality, the furthest a wheel will ever rotate is 90 degrees.
055   *
056   * @param desiredState The desired state.
057   * @param currentAngle The current module angle.
058   * @return Optimized swerve module state.
059   */
060  public static SwerveModuleState optimize(
061      SwerveModuleState desiredState, Rotation2d currentAngle) {
062    var delta = desiredState.angle.minus(currentAngle);
063    if (Math.abs(delta.getDegrees()) > 90.0) {
064      return new SwerveModuleState(
065          -desiredState.speedMetersPerSecond,
066          desiredState.angle.rotateBy(Rotation2d.fromDegrees(180.0)));
067    } else {
068      return new SwerveModuleState(desiredState.speedMetersPerSecond, desiredState.angle);
069    }
070  }
071}
